alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 3:46PM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. A light glaze is expected with light snow and freezing drizzle expected after midnight. Any snow accumulations will be less than an inch. * WHERE...All of northern New York and the western and north central sections of Vermont. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions will continue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain has decreased in areal coverage late this afternoon and has mixed with or changed to rain in some areas. Temperatures will fall below freezing tonight and with additional light freezing rain, light snow, and some freezing drizzle, difficult travel conditions will continue across the area. Visibilities will likely be reduced due to fog, which could further impact travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
